name: Stimuli
description:
Stimuli is a difficult Rogue-Like Sci-Fi Platformer where you are a test subject trapped in a mysterious laboratory! Can you fight your way through hordes of robots and escape the lab? If not, bring the next test subject!

With an unforgiving permadeath, a new mechanic added every level, a challenging combat system, and well hidden Easter Eggs, Stimuli delivers fast paced adventure in a sleek indie style!

Key Features:
- 2D Pixel Art Style
- Various enemy types
- Platforming obstacles
- Puzzles on every level
- Retro Soundtrack
- Hidden Easter Eggs

Controls:
- WASD or Arrow Keys for movement
- Space or Left Click to Shoot
- Right Click to interact with characters and activate dialogue
- E to interact with objects (E.g. Doors, Items)
-Connect a gamepad to play local multiplayer!
